titleStmt.title: To the right honourable, our right vvorthy and grave senatours, the Lord Mayor, aldermen, and commonalty of the city of London in Common Council assembled. [Th]e most humble petition and address of divers young men, on the behalf of themselves and the apprentices in and about this honourable city.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Petition for peace in the city of London and a new Parliament.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
